name: Ahmad Whafa Azka Al Azkiyai
title: Fraud Detection & AI Security Specialist
tagline: Federated Learning Security | Adversarial ML | Privacy-Preserving AI

bio.short: Published researcher and AI practitioner with 3+ years experience building enterprise-scale fraud detection systems. Research interests: federated learning security, adversarial ML, privacy-preserving AI.
bio.long: Published researcher and AI practitioner with 3+ years of experience building and operating enterprise-scale fraud detection systems for major Indonesian financial institutions. Combines deep domain expertise in financial security with hands-on machine learning engineering, having developed production ML pipelines processing millions of real-time transactions.
